mapper.sql: FEEDBACK_RECORD_ID, RECORD_PRIORITY, CUSTOMER_ID, STATE, FEEDBACK_TYPE, FEEDBACK_DATE, FEEDBACK_REASON, HEAD, FEEDBACK_RESOURCE, FEEDBACK_THEME, FEEDBACK_DESCRIBE, ANALYSIS, COMPANY_ID, LAST_MODIFY_DATE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from XS_CUSTOMER_FEEDBACK
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into XS_CUSTOMER_FEEDBACK (FEEDBACK_RECORD_ID, RECORD_PRIORITY, CUSTOMER_ID, STATE, FEEDBACK_TYPE, FEEDBACK_DATE, FEEDBACK_REASON, HEAD, FEEDBACK_RESOURCE, FEEDBACK_THEME, FEEDBACK_DESCRIBE, ANALYSIS, COMPANY_ID, LAST_MODIFY_DATE ) values (#{feedbackRecordId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{recordPriority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feedbackType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feedbackDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{feedbackReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{head,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feedbackResource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feedbackTheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feedbackDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{analysis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into XS_CUSTOMER_FEEDBACK
FEEDBACK_RECORD_ID,
RECORD_PRIORITY,
CUSTOMER_ID,
STATE,
FEEDBACK_TYPE,
FEEDBACK_DATE,
FEEDBACK_REASON,
HEAD,
FEEDBACK_RESOURCE,
FEEDBACK_THEME,
FEEDBACK_DESCRIBE,
ANALYSIS,
COMPANY_ID,
LAST_MODIFY_DATE,

mapper.update:
update XS_CUSTOMER_FEEDBACK
FEEDBACK_RECORD_ID = #{record.feedbackRecordId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RECORD_PRIORITY = #{record.recordPriority,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_ID = #{record.customerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATE = #{record.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEEDBACK_TYPE = #{record.feedbackType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEEDBACK_DATE = #{record.feedbackDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FEEDBACK_REASON = #{record.feedbackReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HEAD = #{record.head,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEEDBACK_RESOURCE = #{record.feedbackResource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEEDBACK_THEME = #{record.feedbackTheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEEDBACK_DESCRIBE = #{record.feedbackDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANALYSIS = #{record.analysis,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{record.companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_MODIFY_DATE = #{record.lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update XS_CUSTOMER_FEEDBACK set FEEDBACK_RECORD_ID = #{record.feedbackRecordId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RECORD_PRIORITY = #{record.recordPriority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_ID = #{record.customerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATE = #{record.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEEDBACK_TYPE = #{record.feedbackType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEEDBACK_DATE = #{record.feedbackDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FEEDBACK_REASON = #{record.feedbackReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HEAD = #{record.head,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEEDBACK_RESOURCE = #{record.feedbackResource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEEDBACK_THEME = #{record.feedbackTheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEEDBACK_DESCRIBE = #{record.feedbackDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANALYSIS = #{record.analysis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_ID = #{record.companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_MODIFY_DATE = #{record.lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update XS_CUSTOMER_FEEDBACK
RECORD_PRIORITY = #{recordPriority,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEEDBACK_TYPE = #{feedbackType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEEDBACK_DATE = #{feedbackDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FEEDBACK_REASON = #{feedbackReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HEAD = #{head,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEEDBACK_RESOURCE = #{feedbackResource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEEDBACK_THEME = #{feedbackTheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEEDBACK_DESCRIBE = #{feedbackDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANALYSIS = #{analysis,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_MODIFY_DATE = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where FEEDBACK_RECORD_ID = #{feedbackRecordId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update XS_CUSTOMER_FEEDBACK set RECORD_PRIORITY = #{recordPriority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEEDBACK_TYPE = #{feedbackType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEEDBACK_DATE = #{feedbackDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FEEDBACK_REASON = #{feedbackReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HEAD = #{head,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEEDBACK_RESOURCE = #{feedbackResource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEEDBACK_THEME = #{feedbackTheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEEDBACK_DESCRIBE = #{feedbackDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANALYSIS = #{analysis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_MODIFY_DATE = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where FEEDBACK_RECORD_ID = #{feedbackRecordId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
